name: netzero-backend
description: Backend API for NetZero Odoo integration

scripts.postinstall: node --input-type=commonjs -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const routerPath = path.join(process.cwd(), 'node_modules', 'express', 'lib', 'router', 'index.js'); if (!fs.existsSync(routerPath)) { console.error('✗ Express router missing at:', routerPath); process.exit(1); } try { require('express/lib/router'); console.log('✓ Express router verified'); } catch(e) { console.error('✗ Express installation incomplete:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
